name: Front-Loaded Calories (Large Breakfast)
properties: Eat more calories earlier in day
More calories burned when eaten early
benefits: Due to circadian rhythms, the same calories eaten at breakfast are less fattening than when eaten at dinner. Front-loading calories by eating a larger breakfast optimizes metabolism and reduces fat storage. This aligns eating with the body's natural circadian patterns for better weight management.
amount: Make breakfast the largest meal of the day

quotes: FRONT-LOAD CALORIES - Eat more calories earlier in the day. Breakfast like a king, lunch like a prince, dinner like a pauper. Make breakfast or lunch your largest meal of the day, and eat a light dinner or skip it entirely.
Because of our circadian rhythm, food eaten at night is more fattening than the exact same food eaten earlier in the day
